metadata.name: JXA In-memory Execution Via OSAScript
metadata.comment: Detects possible malicious execution of JXA in-memory via OSAScript

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osascript')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('eval')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nsdata.datawithcontentsofurl')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -l ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('javascript')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.js')))

output.summary: Detects possible malicious execution of JXA in-memory via OSAScript

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown Reference: https://redcanary.com/blog/applescript/
